name: Professor LaBait
description:
Metroidvania without Attacking.

Figure out how to solve the puzzles and defeat the enemies, all without attacking! If you make it through, who knows what awaits you at the end...

Move left - A or Left

Move right - D or Right

Jump - Space

Created by

Andrew Dang - https://shuandang.itch.io/

Alex Wilson - https://babaoriley.itch.io/

Felix Lee - https://flee135.itch.io/
